mapper.insert: insert into jacg_weixin_queinvest (id, title, description, queinvestType, create_user, create_date, update_user, update_date, del, valid, status) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{description}, #{queinvestType}, #{createUser.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateUser.id}, #{updateDate}, '0', #{valid}, '0' );

SELECT t1.id id, t1.title title, t1.`description` description,
t1.valid valid, t1.status status, /*问卷类型*/ t2.label queinvestType,
t1.pubdate pubdate
FROM jacg_weixin_queinvest t1 left join sys_dict t2 on t1.queinvestType = t2.value and t2.type = 'queinvestType' /*字典项*/
where t1.del!=1
and `title` like concat('%', #{title}, '%')
and pubdate >= #{startTime} and t1.status = '2'
and #{endTime} >= pubdate and t1.status = '2'
mapper.update:
update jacg_weixin_queinvest t1 set t1.title = #{title}, t1.valid = #{valid}, t1.queinvestType = #{queinvestType}, t1.description = #{description}, t1.update_date = #{updateDate}, t1.update_user = #{updateUser.id}
where t1.id=#{id}
